sys_ui_annotation.text:
This page allows you to configure the connection between the IT Assist platform and your instance of ServiceNow. ServiceNow will contact the endpoints listed to allow for notifications to be broadcasted across all of the Kore.ai ITSM platform.
- Authorization Key: A - Service Host Table Endpoint: B - Platform Table Endpoint: C
